definition: to cross little fingers (between children) as a promise
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
